ha.devauth.embed.preauth.description.nosess: **Ba ku kar…ìi yarjejeniyar mai amfani akan bayanan martaba ba {0}**
ha.devauth.embed.preauth.description.active: Amfani da wa…óannan fasalulluka na STW na yau da kullun (Tsarin Na'urar, Saituna, Profile, da sauransu) ana sarrafa su ta ∆ôarin ∆ôarin sharu…ó…óan masu zuwa:
ha.devauth.embed.legal.title: 1. Yarjejeniyar amfani
ha.devauth.embed.legal.description: Ta yin amfani da wa…óannan fasalulluka, kuna nuna yarjejeniya ga tushen yarjejeniyar STW Daily, akwai a: {0}. Hakanan kun yarda da wa…óannan sharu…ó…óan da aka zayyana a cikin wannan yarjejeniya.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement2: Samun damar ku zuwa wa…óannan fasalulluka yana kasancewa azaman lasisi wanda za'a iya soke shi a kowane lokaci saboda kowane dalili. ∆òungiyar STW Daily Dev Team tana da ha∆ô∆ôin soke damar ku a kowane lokaci saboda kowane dalili.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement4: Kuna da alhakin duk asusu(s) da ke da ala∆ôa da wannan sabis …óin, da duk wani abu da zai iya faruwa gare su. Kai ne ke da alhakin yin aikinka don kiyaye amintattun asusunku, da aminci; KAR KA YI AMFANI DA ACCOUNT (S) WANDA BA KA SAMU HANYAR Imel (sai dai idan ba ka fahimci abin da kake yi ba), a matsayin 'password rest' ana iya kunnawa akan asusu da aka ha…óa.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement5: Kuna …óaukar duk wani alhaki a cikin amfani da STW Daily. ∆òungiyar Daily ta STW ∆ôila ba za a …óauki alhakin kowane sakamako mara kyau ba.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement7: ∆òungiyoyin Daily STW suna ∆ôo∆ôarin kiyaye asusunku a matsayin mai tsaro kamar yadda zai yiwu, yayin da yake kasancewa a bayyane kuma bude tushen. Muna adana wasu ∆ôayyadaddun bayanai wa…óanda ke da ala∆ôa da asusun Discord …óin ku akan bayanan MongoDB Atlas wanda aka shirya a Amurka. STW Daily kanta ana gudanar da ita akan sabar AWS a Amurka. Ana adana bayanan asusun ku amintacce azaman rufaffen bayanan AES wanda kawai …ìangare na STW Daily Team ke samun dama ga.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement9: STW Daily zai tattara da adana ta∆ôaitaccen bayanan da ke da ala∆ôa da asusun Discord …óin ku, don adana bayanan tantance asusun na dogon lokaci, da kuma samar muku da gogewa mai kyau duka biyu yanzu. , kuma a nan gaba. Kuna iya duba Manufar Sirrin mu anan: {0}
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement10: Duk lokacin da kuka yi ∆ôo∆ôarin tantancewa ba tare da wani zama mai aiki ba, zaku iya tantancewa ta atomatik tare da asusun da ke da ala∆ôa da wannan bayanan.
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement11: Idan kana son cire wannan hanyar, danna maballin {0} **Cire hanyar ha…ói**
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement12: Don sake tabbatarwa da wannan asusu, danna ma…ìallin {0} **Sake Tabbatarwa Yanzu**
ha.devauth.embed.legal.agreement13: Don kunna auto. -da'awar duk asusun ku, danna maballin {0} **Ku kunna da'awar atomatik**
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description1: Don musaki da'awar duk asusunku, danna maballin {0} **Kashe Da'awar atomatik**
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description3: *An yi nasarar yin da'awar kai tsaye*
ha.devauth.embed.existing.description5: ∆òir∆ôiri zaman tantancewa wanda zai sa ku shiga na dogon lokaci
ha.devauth.embed.existing.processed.success: Wannan umarnin yana ba ku damar adana zaman tantancewar ku don kiyaye ku cikin dogon lokaci. Da zarar kun saita wannan umarni, ba za ku ∆ôara bu∆ôatar samar da lambar auth …óin ku ba.
Kar ku yi amfani da wannan umarni sai dai idan kuna da damar shiga imel …óin asusunku, saboda ana iya kunna kalmar sirri ta sake saiti.
ha.devauth.slash.name: Bayan kun saita ingantaccen na'urar, zaku iya amfani da wannan umarni don shiga cikin lokacin gwaji ta atomatik. Wannan zai …óauki ladan ku na STW ta atomatik kowace rana. Kuna iya fita daga wannan a kowane lokaci.

ha.stw.item.Voucher_BasicPack.name.plural: Yana Juyawa zuwa Tikitin X-Ray ga kowa da kowa, da kuma V-Bucks idan kuna da asusun Kafa.
ha.stw.item.CardPack_Hero_R.name: Ku…óin da aka samu ta hanyar kammala Bu∆ôatun yau da kullun, Tsaron Garkuwar guguwa, da wasu Fa…óakarwar Ofishin Jakadancin. An yi ciniki don X-Ray Llamas a cikin Shagon Llama.

ha.stw.item.Reagent_C_T01.name.plural: Kunna ha…ìakar XP don samun maki ha…ìakar Asusu XP. ∆òarfafa maki sami {0} ∆ôarin ∆ôwarewa don kanku, da kuma ba da kyauta {0} ga duk sauran 'yan wasa a ∆ôungiyar ku! ha.wex.item.CD_Cleric_VR2_Dark_TerraRifle_T: Hanyoyin Jarumi. Taswirar taswirar sihiri wanda zai iya kaiwa ga jarumta da aka kama. An yi amfani da shi don bu…óe tambayoyin Skybreaker don jarumai na farko.
ha.wex.item.CD_Pet_UC1_Painguin_Water_T03.d: Hanyoyin Jarumi. Taswirar taswirar sihiri wanda zai iya kaiwa ga gwarzon da ya kama. An yi amfani da shi don bu…óe tambayoyin Skybreaker don Super Rare Heroes.

ha.wex.item.Reagent_HeroMap_SuperRare.name: Tushen wutar lantarki
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialArmor.de: Ku…ói. Ana iya amfani da shi don ha…ìaka matakin iyawa na musamman na kowane jarumi. An samo shi da farko a cikin akwatunan kyauta na aboki.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialShield.d: Ma…ìallin Kurkuku. An yi amfani da shi don bu…óe matakan musamman. Ana samuwa da farko a cikin Gwaji da kuma cikin Kasuwa. Matakan da aka kulle ba su da hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'i na gamawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialSword.de: Ma…ìallin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga Hamada mai ban sha'awa. Arziki yana da yawa a cikin wannan …ìangarorin …ìalle! Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Misc_CeremonialSword.na: An binne shi a Taswirar Hamada
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Dark.desc: Ma…ìallin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar isa ga Planet's Core. An taba tunanin shigarta kogon al'ajabi ce. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Dark.name: Babban Taswirar Taswirar Duniya
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Fire.desc: Ma…ìallin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga dajin ∆òar∆ôashin Ruwa. Wannan dazuzzukan da ke nutsewa na iya …óaukar asirai da abubuwan ban mamaki da yawa. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Fire.name: Taswirar Dajin ∆òar∆ôashin Ruwa
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Light.desc: Ma…ìallin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga Ramin ∆òar∆ôashin Ruwa. Tatsuniyoyi sun ce an kafa wannan rami ta hanyar mage mai ∆ôarfi. Babu hukumcin gazawa ko juzu'in kammalawa.
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Light.name: Taswirar Ramin ∆òar∆ôashin Ruwa
ha.wex.item.Reagent_Shard_Nature.desc: Ma…ìallin Kurkuku. Yana ba da damar shiga kwarin Waterfall. An san shi duka don kyawun kyawunsa, da wa…óanda suka …ìace don neman asirinta. Babu hukunce-hukuncen gazawa, ko juzu'i na kammalawa.
